title: 256.94 CONFERENCES OF VARIOUS OFFICIALS.
text: For the purpose of promoting economy and efficiency in the enforcement of laws relating to children, and particularly of laws relating to children with developmental disabilities and delinquent, dependent, and neglected children, the commissioner of human services may, at such times and places as the commissioner deems advisable, call an annual conference with officials responsible for the enforcement of such laws. When practicable such conference shall be held at the same time and place as the state conference of social work.
